AzureBlade's hesitation clearly showed that he was not expecting such 
an answer.

Azure: Huh... Well, I guess you could stay, but you would be checked. 
I don't thinik that the Maximals would treat you badly, but they 
wouldn't trust you right away either... It does bring another problem 
though; you wouldn't be the one they'd have known...
